data.title: Siam - Wife & Sister of King Chulalonkorn
data.meta_description: Drawing with caption Siam - the Wife and Sister of King Chulalonkorn from Katie Piatt scrapbook. King Chulalongkorn married at least four of his half-sisters along with 32 concubines and consorts, so it difficult to make a positive identification of the woman pictured.
data.text:
Description

Drawing with caption Siam - the Wife and Sister of King Chulalonkorn from Katie Piatt scrapbook. King Chulalongkorn married at least four of his half-sisters along with 32 concubines and consorts, so it difficult to make a positive identification of the woman pictured.
